text: - The AWS Gen AI Loft is very important
because there's all this content available
for you in this short period of time,

and you can learn everything
you need to know very fast.

- Amazon and AWS have
been at the forefront
of our AI revolution.
We're a robotic AI company,

and the last thing we want to
do is work through all sorts
of challenging infrastructure.

- When it comes to gen AI,
Bedrock is a very good way

to go fast, iterate fast,
develop a new feature

in a matter of days, and
have it tested by customers.

- The whole AWS
infrastructure really helps,
not only on the technology side,
but also on the people side,
and that's super valuable for us.

We were talking about community
and having places to meet.

Now, that you have spaces
like the Gen AI Loft,
I think it kind of fills that space.
(upbeat music)
